title: Diamond & Gemstone Chandramukhi Haaram - An Elegant South Indian Statement Piece
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish; Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
G Color); Faceted Emerald (Square Cut); Faceted Ruby (Oval Cut); Cultured Pearls
features: This Chandramukhi Haaram features a stunning crescent-shaped necklace with concentric rows of dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds. The central pendant is a circular design adorned with ruby, emerald, and diamond accents. Delicate pearl drops gracefully enhance the necklace's lower edge. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lasting shine. The back of the haaram is intricately designed, ensuring both beauty and comfort.
colors: with pops of vibrant green (emerald) and red (ruby). The pearls offer a soft
occasions: and other grand celebrations. It's also ideal for Seemantham ceremonies
and other traditional South Indian events.
description: This Chandramukhi Haaram blends traditional design elements with modern sparkle, making it a truly unique piece. The high-quality diamonds and carefully selected gemstones ensure lasting brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish protects the gold, ensuring its radiant luster for years to come. It's a statement piece that celebrates South Indian heritage while embracing contemporary elegance.
